item.title: everything you need to know about hypothesis testing
item.description: THIS IS A DRAFT> CHECK BACK LATER FOR THE FULL POST Welcome to my first blogpost! I hope to keep posting about statistics fundamentals, my thoughts on public health and healthcare on a regular basis. I am excited for you all to join me! what is hypothesis testing? Before we get into what hypothesis testing is, let’s talk about what hypothesis is. A hypothesis is an educated guess about something in the world around you.
